tool.name: getRSImageInfo
tool.displayname: 1. GEM1 NOS File to GEM2 Compatibility Tool

param.name: NOS File
param.dialogReference: This parameter is the NOS shapefile of dark features for a specific year developed by visual interpretation following steps 1-5 of the GEM1 workflow.

param.name: Mosaic Dataset
param.dialogReference: These parameters encompass the collection of mosaic datasets for the specific year of the NOS file. They are found in the geodatabase produced by step 5 of the GEM1 workflow.

tool.summary: The first step in the GEM1 to GEM2 process, thistool populates the NOS file following GEM1 Step 5 with information toaccess the Radarsat-2 images associated with each dark feature. See help document to make sure the NOS File is properly organised first.

idCitation.resTitle: 1. GEM1 NOS File to GEM2 Compatibility Tool

dataIdInfo.idAbs: The first step in the GEM1 to GEM2 process, thistool populates the NOS file following GEM1 Step 5 with information toaccess the Radarsat-2 images associated with each dark feature. See help document to make sure the NOS File is properly organised first.
